article_title: The Long Odyssey Of A Child Soldier
article_description: Like every kid in Northern Uganda in the 1990s  Okello Moses Rubangangeyo grew up terrified of Joseph Kony
article_content: This Delacorte Review story is being published in partnership with London based Granta magazine  with a mission to discover and publish the best in new literary fiction  memoir  reportage  and poetry from around the world ol li  Boy  interrupted li ol   62064 chars
